skills.name: kubectl
skills.pattern:
kubectl version
kubectl cluster-info
kubectl get nodes

skills.name: Get Pods
skills.pattern:
kubectl get pods
kubectl get pods -n namespace
kubectl get pods -o wide

skills.name: Pod YAML
skills.pattern:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: myapp
spec:
  containers:
  - name: myapp
    image: myapp:latest
    ports:
    - containerPort: 3000

skills.name: Deployment
skills.pattern:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: myapp
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: myapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: myapp
        image: myapp:latest

skills.name: Scale Deployment
skills.pattern:
kubectl scale deployment myapp --replicas=5
kubectl autoscale deployment myapp --min=2 --max=10 --cpu-percent=80

skills.name: Service
skills.pattern:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: myapp-svc
spec:
  selector:
    app: myapp
  ports:
  - port: 80
    targetPort: 3000
  type: ClusterIP

skills.name: Service Types
skills.pattern: ClusterIP (internal), NodePort (external port), LoadBalancer (cloud LB), ExternalName (DNS alias)

skills.name: Ingress
skills.pattern:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  name: myapp-ingress
spec:
  rules:
  - host: myapp.example.com
    http:
      paths:
      - path: /
        pathType: Prefix
        backend:
          service:
            name: myapp-svc
            port:
              number: 80

skills.name: ConfigMap
skills.pattern:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: myapp-config
data:
  DATABASE_URL: postgres://...
  LOG_LEVEL: info

skills.name: Secret
skills.pattern:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Secret
metadata:
  name: myapp-secret
type: Opaque
data:
  password: cGFzc3dvcmQ= # base64

skills.name: PersistentVolume
skills.pattern:
apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolumeClaim
metadata:
  name: myapp-pvc
spec:
  accessModes:
    - ReadWriteOnce
  resources:
    requests:
      storage: 10Gi

skills.name: Namespace
skills.pattern:
kubectl create namespace production
kubectl get all -n production
kubectl config set-context --current --namespace=production

skills.name: Apply Resources
skills.pattern:
kubectl apply -f deployment.yaml
kubectl apply -f ./k8s/
kubectl apply -k ./kustomize/

skills.name: Describe
skills.pattern:
kubectl describe pod myapp-xxx
kubectl describe deployment myapp
kubectl describe node worker-1

skills.name: Logs
skills.pattern:
kubectl logs myapp-xxx
kubectl logs -f myapp-xxx
kubectl logs myapp-xxx -c sidecar

skills.name: Exec
skills.pattern:
kubectl exec -it myapp-xxx -- sh
kubectl exec myapp-xxx -- ls /app

skills.name: Rollout
skills.pattern:
kubectl rollout status deployment/myapp
kubectl rollout history deployment/myapp
kubectl rollout undo deployment/myapp

skills.name: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
skills.pattern:
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: myapp-hpa
spec:
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: myapp
  minReplicas: 2
  maxReplicas: 10
  metrics:
  - type: Resource
    resource:
      name: cpu
      target:
        type: Utilization
        averageUtilization: 80

skills.name: Job
skills.pattern:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: migration
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: migrate
        image: myapp:latest
        command: ['npm', 'run', 'migrate']
      restartPolicy: Never

skills.name: CronJob
skills.pattern:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: backup
spec:
  schedule: '0 0 * * *'
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - name: backup
            image: backup:latest

skills.name: Probes
skills.pattern:
livenessProbe:
  httpGet:
    path: /health
    port: 3000
  initialDelaySeconds: 30
readinessProbe:
  httpGet:
    path: /ready
    port: 3000

skills.name: Resources
skills.pattern:
resources:
  requests:
    memory: '256Mi'
    cpu: '250m'
  limits:
    memory: '512Mi'
    cpu: '500m'

skills.name: Environment
skills.pattern:
env:
- name: DATABASE_URL
  valueFrom:
    secretKeyRef:
      name: myapp-secret
      key: database-url
- name: LOG_LEVEL
  valueFrom:
    configMapKeyRef:
      name: myapp-config
      key: log-level

skills.name: Helm
skills.pattern:
helm repo add stable https://charts.helm.sh/stable
helm install myapp ./chart
helm upgrade myapp ./chart
helm list

skills.name: Port Forward
skills.pattern:
kubectl port-forward pod/myapp-xxx 3000:3000
kubectl port-forward svc/myapp-svc 8080:80

skills.name: Labels
skills.pattern:
kubectl label pods myapp-xxx env=production
kubectl get pods -l app=myapp
kubectl get pods -l 'env in (prod,staging)'

skills.name: Delete
skills.pattern:
kubectl delete pod myapp-xxx
kubectl delete -f deployment.yaml
kubectl delete deployment myapp

skills.name: Context
skills.pattern:
kubectl config get-contexts
kubectl config use-context production
kubectl config current-context

skills.name: Debug
skills.pattern:
kubectl get events --sort-by='.lastTimestamp'
kubectl top pods
kubectl top nodes

skills.name: RBAC
skills.pattern:
kubectl create serviceaccount myapp-sa
kubectl create rolebinding myapp-binding --role=admin --serviceaccount=default:myapp-sa
